title: tAmasamA ammA
sahitya:
tAmasamA ammA undan tALinai tuNai enRu nambina enaiyALa


anupallavi

  kAma krOdAdi aupaghai upAdi kaLiyATTam Oyndunran kazhaliNaik-kALAkka


caraNam    Uzhvinai valiyAl en vAzhvu pAzhAga un tiruvuLLa sammatamO
vIzhvaduNarAmal viLaiyADum magavaittAi vEdikkai pArppaduNDO en ammA
